products.title: Canvas Satin Perfect Fit
products.description: An off-white hue with a touch of honey, the canvas satin perfect fit twins an organic hue with a mid-gloss shine, ideal for natural materials like wicker and pine. As their most hard wearing style, perfect fits are ideal for busy or humid spaces such as conservatories and receptions struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Dream White Satin Perfect Fit
products.description: Dream white satin's off-white, creamy tone is the perfect match for luxurious decor. Fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds offer a simple shading solution for conservatories, patio doors and 'tricky' windows other shades can't cover. Aluminium blinds are their most hard wearing style, ideal for busy or humid spaces. Struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Pure White Satin Perfect Fit
products.description: Clean and delicate, the pure white is their mid-gloss white perfect fit, sitting between the high-gloss snow white and matte soft white. Created from aluminium these slats are completely water resistant and hardwearing, ideal for humid spaces like bathrooms and conservatories, as well as high-traffic areas like receptions. Struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Pure White Gloss Perfect Fit
products.description: A pure white knight in shining aluminium armour, this pure white gloss will vanquish harsh sunlight in the stroke of a shuttered slat. products.title: Soft White Matt Perfect Fit
